details:
verb
- to make more concise
= example: to make more concise
= synonyms: concentrate
- to undergo condensation
- to compress or concentrate
= example: to compress or concentrate
= synonyms: concentrate
- to develop due to condensation
= example: to develop due to condensation
- to become more compact or concentrated
= example: to become more compact or concentrated
- to cause a gas or vapor to change into a liquid
= example: to cause a gas or vapor to change into a liquid
- to remove water from
= example: to remove water from
= synonyms: desiccate
